analyzed: saraṇa duka dassanena apahātabba duka ādi

original: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: saraṇam dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: araṇam na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paccayā na araṇaḥ na na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam sauttaram dhammam paccayā na saraṇaḥ na sauttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
sahajāta vāram pi pe pañhā vāram pi
dhamma anuloma paccanīye duka duka paṭṭhānam niṭṭhita
